title: Underware
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Underware**

Underware is a (typo)graphic design-studio which is specialized in designing and producing typefaces. These are published for retail sale or are specially tailor-made. The company was founded in 1999 by [Akiem Helmling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Akiem%20Helmling), [Bas Jacobs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bas%20Jacobs) and [Sami Kortemäki](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sami%20Kortemaki). Underware is based in the corresponding studios of each of its three principals in [Den Haag](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Hague), [Helsinki](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Helsinki) and [Amsterdam](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Amsterdam) respectively.

Underware started [TypeRadio](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypeRadio) and various type workshops. Underware designed the cover of [font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font_Magazine) issue 004.

Underware fonts: [Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bello), [Sauna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sauna), [Auto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Auto), [Dolly](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dolly), [Fakir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fakir) and [Unibody](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005145/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Unibody).
